parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

requests.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Nesciunt tempora nostrum.","description":"Voluptatum est sed. Commodi nisi dolores. Omnis modi omnis. Dolor corporis enim. Consectetur quam est.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-02-13","end_at":"2019-02-15","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]}}}
requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/me/events" -d '{"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Nesciunt tempora nostrum.","description":"Voluptatum est sed. Commodi nisi dolores. Omnis modi omnis. Dolor corporis enim. Consectetur quam est.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-02-13","end_at":"2019-02-15","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]}}}' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer 1ba0c7f3231f3ac1347259fbc1aeac60af47ca04c960d41287ac7dbe96a454c7" \
